Hi Guys,

I was desperatly flying around the MÃƒÂ¼n until i finally found one of the Archs.

Then I got curios and searched the Web for other Locations (Easter Eggs) on the MÃƒÂ¼n and I pinned them down on the Topographic Map from KSP-Wiki.

Armstrong = Armstrong Memorial (My favorite)

You could always just use ISA mapsat to get your own maps of them in-game.
Oh wow, just saw that mod on Youtube, thank you
